channel.title: CVE Feed for Arcserve -- Unified Data Protection
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Arcserve -- Unified Data Protection

item.title: CVE-2024-0801|2024-08-01T18:18:18.789Z -- arcserve -- unified%20data%20protection
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Arcserve Unified Data Protection 9.2 and 8.1 in ASNative.dll.

item.title: CVE-2024-0800|2024-08-01T18:18:18.806Z -- arcserve -- unified%20data%20protection
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability exists in Arcserve Unified Data Protection 9.2 and 8.1 in edge-app-base-webui.jar!com.ca.arcserve.edge.app.base.ui.server.servlet.ImportNodeServlet.

item.title: CVE-2024-0799|2024-08-01T18:18:18.612Z -- arcserve -- unified%20data%20protection
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in Arcserve Unified Data Protection 9.2 and 8.1 in the edge-app-base-webui.jar!com.ca.arcserve.edge.app.base.ui.server.EdgeLoginServiceImpl.doLogin() function within wizardLogin.

item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in Arcserve Unified Data Protection 9.2 and 8.1 in ASNative.dll.

item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in Arcserve Unified Data Protection 9.2 and 8.1 in the edge-app-base-webui.jar!com.ca.arcserve.edge.app.base.ui.server.EdgeLoginServiceImpl.doLogin() function within wizardLogin.
